ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 46
Message-ID: <17248.46.129.959279670@...>
Date: 24 Aug 1999 20:14:36 -0000
From: Light4700@...
Subject: Gauntlet Legends

   Ha!  I love Gauntlet Legends.  I can't wait until it comes out for the N64 and Dreamcast.  Right now at the arcades I have a level 30 Conjurer which is an upgrade of the wizard.  He has a permenant eagle of some sort flying on top of him shooting double with my attack.  I hope Gladiator Beyond Freedom comes out just like that with extra characters and everything. password protected internet characters and other neat things like gauntlet legends
